Basic Tissue Culture Workflow

Overview

This protocol describes routine passaging of adherent cells.

Materials

  • Sterile tissue culture hood

  • Appropriate media

  • PBS, trypsin, etc.

Protocol

  1. Warm media and reagents to 37°C.

  2. Aspirate old media from the flask.

  3. Wash with PBS, add trypsin, and incubate briefly.

  4. Neutralize with media and reseed into new flasks.
